website_summaries.verdict: A quality pizza peel with handle made with beautiful genuine acacia wood.
pros: Inexpensive and attractive, this wooden pizza peel is large enough to fit pizzas up to about 16 inches
Pizzas slide off easily, and the handle is long enough to grip without feeling unsteady
cons: Wood does begin to split after a while

customer_reviews.title: A satisfying moment of pure peace
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the simple things in life have huge impact on our future. Setting off a domino of events that have the power of transforming desolate barren wastelands into lush oasis. The power to inspire. The power to alter ones own reality. Should you choose to select this pizza peel for your very own, take heed to my warning here and now. Wield this peel carefully. It will change you. It will bring everyone closer. Strangers will become acquaintances. Acquaintances become friends. Friends become lovers. “You miss 100% of the shots you dont take. - Wayne Gretsky” - Michael Scott
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: This arrived broken on arrival. Paddle appears to be made of a few pieces of wood and one was floating around in the packaging. Hesitant to reorder as I suspect this won’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: not so good
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these so far working on getting a 3rd sent but the 1st one cracked in half like it wasnt glued together well. the 2nd one was sent warped and now I am waiting to see if the 3rd one is the charm. so far this has been garbage
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional too!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived this afternoon - so quick! - used it for our pizza dinner a couple of hours later! It's just beautiful. In fact, my rather picky husband was so thrilled with the design that he set about hanging it on our kitchen wall immediately after clean up! Thanks to the designers and creators!
customer_reviews.author: Joann H.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.text: I can't find anything to criticize. It comes packaged really well in a sturdy box with a bubble wrap bag inside holding the peel. It worked great the first time in placing and retrieving the pizza. Hint: sprinkle the peel with a little flour and corn meal before you put your fresh made pizza on it and it slides off like a dream. The peel it very attractive, you could hang it your kitchen wall as an accessory and we're planning on using it as a charcuterie board for cocktail parties, etc. You'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Too beautiful to store away, sturdy and easy to hold/carry/wash
customer_reviews.text: This pizza peel was purchased so my husband could try making pizza on a pizza stone in the BBQ. I followed the simple tips to sprinkle corn meal before putting the dough on the peel, and the raw dough slid right off the peel onto the hot pizza stone. Once done, the tapered edges of the peel let me slide the cooked pizza back on and carry it inside. It's nice thick wood so it's very sturdy, and it wiped clean easily. It's such a pretty piece of wood as is shown in the advertisement, I'm just looking for a place to hang it when not in use. In a drawer or cabinet would be such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Sha

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Pizzaz!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pizza peel...so pretty you will want to hang it on your kitchen wall. It makes my rustic pizza look gorgeous! Best customer service of all the many companies that I have purchased from through Amazon. Since my pizza is loaded with sauce, sausage, pepperoni, mushrooms, onions, and cheese, I will be baking my pizza on parchment so it is easier to slide on and off the pizza peel. With so many choices, I had a hard time deciding, but I finally found a pizza peel that has functionality and aesthetics....pizza pizzaz!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeView

customer_reviews.title: I'm expecting good things from Heritage
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried it yet, but so far it looks and feels like exceptional quality and I am already leaving a review because of the truly original and hilarious letter that came in the box. It was a message written from the company giving you a mission to save the future that was very creative and not at all afraid to be "too weird" and only sticking to a typical safe every-corporation humor, this was a very clever and interesting humor that really made me smile.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Beatiful and functional pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it is beautiful. We have hung it on our kitchen wall as a decorative element. Second, it is the perfect size for home pizza baking. Third, it is easy to clean; just wipe it off with a damp rag as the directions suggest. Fourth, and despite a review indicating that it is difficult to slide under a pizza, it is easy to use; even though it is much thicker than a metal peel it slides easily under a pizza. A very nice tool.
customer_reviews.author: Art Robins

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: Item looks very nice, but the wood is very thin and flexible. Mine arrived warped and chipped. The dough stuck to it every time I tried to use it no matter if I put flour or cornmeal on it. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bcopley1116

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but too rough for fresh pizza dough
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of the peel however I could tell that it would have fell apart very soon since a slight crack was already starting to form before even using it. The most important thing for me is that the wood surface is too rough to be able to make a fresh pizza crust on and slide onto a stone, the poor sanding job leaves rough spots that grab and tear the fresh dough as you try to remove it especially in a tight oven. Maybe more flour would help but I don't want to end up with a pile of flour in my oven either.
customer_reviews.author: Motley

customer_reviews.title: Would have been a nice peel but for the quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer appears to be having some quality control issues as mine arrived split down the middle. Otherwise the pizza peel looked to be made of quality materials and certainly would have been beautiful would it not have been glued poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This review is important to humanity's future
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy product that feels good in one's hand. I definitely feel blessings of eternal happiness that come with the paddle. No one blesses like those Tibetan monks, that's for sure. It has good weight and the finish is lovely. One of the tools in my kitchen that I actually want to hang on the wall and have out. I received the product quickly, well packaged and it is a good value for the money. My pizza and bread making is definitely helped by this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had this Pizza Peel years ago
customer_reviews.text: We have had a pizza stone for 15 years and always removed the stone with the pizza after baking. Apparently we were very lucky not to have the pizza stone crack when cooling off on the counter (our pizza stone does have a wire rack). We bought this Heritage Acacia Wood Pizza Peel which makes it so much easier to remove pizza from the oven as well as slicing the pizza. The Acacia Wood Pizza Peel does become marked when slicing a pizza, there for the 4 stars in durability.
customer_reviews.author: Dorwinion

customer_reviews.title: Should've bought this one the first time!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this peel after our previous peel (a $12-$14 cheapo) split in two down the middle seam. This one is already clearly much stronger, made better, and will undoubtedly last much longer. However, I plan to make one modification to this 'almost perfect' peel. As a man with average size hands, I found that the grip/handle on it is just a little too wide, making it really uncomfortable to hold and difficult to maneuver. Unless i think of a better solution, I plan to sand down the grip area by 1/4-1/2 inch on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bolz

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this item...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this pizza peel and at initial inspection, it looked okay. A few days later, when I took it out to use, noticed that there was a crack on one of the seams (it's made of multiple pieces, as expected). Other seams were fine (2nd pic). Disappointed, as I really wanted to like this item. Wood looked nice for the price. Will be returning for a better quality item.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I was hoping for after reading the reviews. It arrived tonight and I had my pizza dough ready and waiting for it. I floured my new peel and placed my dough on it and all the toppings and just like all the reviews said, “it just slid right off onto the stone”. So nice and easy! I wish I had gotten one sooner. A must for anyone who makes homemade pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerCBarnett

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Not your run of the mill soft board. It's very pretty. Easy to use. Comfortable to handle. A good all around size. I can squeeze a huge take and bake pizza on it, but just barely - but it works. Don't cut on it though. You'd mark it up. I use a kitchen sheers to cut my pizza anyway....try it!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful but had a noticeable scratch on the front of the pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet bc he received it for Father’s Day and my husband loves it but as soon as He took it out of the box there was a little over an inch long scratch on it. I didn’t like that that’s how it was sent out but I don’t want to do the whole rigamarole of returning it and exchanging it. It looks beautiful just don’t like the scratch.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pizza peel!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently discovered the joy of making pizza on our Big Green Egg. I looked at many pizza peels and finally ordered this one. It does not disappoint! In addition to how pretty it is, it works exceptionally well. A little cornmeal spread on it and the pizza dough slides easily off onto the cooking surface. It's thin enough to easily slide under the finished pizza and pull it back off the cooking surface when done cooking. I wipe it down with warm water and dry thoroughly before storing it and it has maintained it's beauty.
customer_reviews.author: M Graff

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but durable. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: First, this works well for what its intended purpose. Pleasantly surprised with the light weight (but durable). I bought this for its intended purpose but have found so many more uses for it such as a hot pad, a cheese/meat board, quick cutting board and more. I love the color and the overall looks of it. The hole in the handle is nice to hang it up out of the way in the pantry. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Check the size of your pizza stone first
customer_reviews.text: While the peel is certainly handsome, the usable space on it is much smaller than our pizza stone and our rolling surface. We have used copious amounts of flour and cornmeal and gotten our topping process down to a tight two minutes but the pizza still sticks to the peel and makes a mess in the oven. Looks nice hanging on the wall though, might get relegated to a cheeseboard
customer_reviews.author: Laura Campbell

customer_reviews.title: A-peeling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for pizza or bread, thickness is just right too, and the wood is very attractive. I use this mainly for bread baking, and have only used it a couple of times over the week I have owned it, but so far it is my favorite of the 2 wooden peels I own (the other one is a few inches smaller and a little bit thicker, still works nice, but for larger loaves or pizza's its not ideal. Seller has a good sense of humor too.
customer_reviews.author: InTheKnow

customer_reviews.title: Sticky situation
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size, the acacia wood looks nice. Handle could use some ergonomic work, it is pretty wide and isn't the most nimble to maneuver. If you're going to buy this, do a little reading on how to keep pizza dough from sticking. Wood is supposed to be better than metal for this, but I'm on my third iteration and have had a lot of trouble getting things to slide off the peel.
customer_reviews.author: EHG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: Wow! what a gorgeous addition to our Pizza making. This is a beautiful peel, handles perfectly and really does a great job. We have just started making our own Pizza and will never stop as they are turning out better than restaurant pizza. This peel nearly created a small problem in our kitchen as there really wasn't a place to hang it. But seeing how beautiful it is I quickly decided it needs to be displayed and moved an item or two so I can see it up there and just grab it off the wall when needed. This is a great buy and anyone would be happy to own it. Order with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: makes pizza making easier
customer_reviews.text: This pizza slide needs a lot of corn meal to slide the pizza and then a really good snap. After a few washings, the finish is not as good as it was when it came.
customer_reviews.author: John Keogh

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend. I built her a pizza oven and she needed a peel to make use of it. I will post an update after we have used it for a bit. Based on a visual inspection. It seems to be made of high-quality wood with a nice finish. Seems robust enough for many uses and has potential to last quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S.

customer_reviews.title: annoying lacquer finish
customer_reviews.text: i have a couple other wood peels i like much better and will use more often - this one is too fussy for pizza! the clear lacquer doesnt seem fit for food, washing, or cutting. im a real cook and use a real pizza oven. this is better suited for someone to hang on a wall as a decor item.
customer_reviews.author: HLA

customer_reviews.title: A New Love in My Life!
customer_reviews.text: Being in love is a wonderful thing! I love my husband and child and now I love my Heritage Acacia Wood Pizza Peel! Where has this been all my life? I am a bit dismayed, in advance, of the weight I will gain making all my homemade pizzas using my peel but it is just something that I must do! I will also be forced to serve canapes on it as well since it is so beautifully made. Do yourselves a huge favor, bring joy to your life and order one of these peels. You will also get a hoot from the email you receive from the vendor. It is well worth the money. The customer service was stellar!
customer_reviews.author: Ima Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy peel to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a metal peel that I was having mixed results with. This wooden peal makes it so simple to get my pizza onto my baking steel resulting in less unintended calzones. I coat the dough and sprinkle the peel with semolina flour and have had excellent results that way.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent peel. The wood grain looks great and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent peel. The wood grain looks great and the peel has a very high quality, smooth surface. With a little corn-meal the dough slides easily onto my pizza stone. Dough always tended to stick on my older, unfinished peel even with a lot of corn meal so this is a big improvement. I will just point out that the finish on the peel lip scratched pretty easily when I was sliding the dough onto the stone. This is not a knock on the peel, it's just an FYI. Overall, I am very pleased with this purchase and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: The peel is beautiful and large enouch to use for many things.
customer_reviews.text: I am keeping this peel because it arrived the day before I needed to use it. Unfortunately it arrived with a 5 inch crack in the wood. So I had to use wood filler to keep the crack from getting larger. I recommend this peel and would buy it again just request that "quality control and inspection" improve.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic PIzza Peel
customer_reviews.text: We started cooking pizzas in our pellet smoker on a pizza stone. After one attempt we decided to get a pizza peel to make the job easier. After much research, we chose the "Heritage Acacia Wood Pizza Peel". The quality is excellent, it looks great enough to hang on the wall, and it works great for sliding a pizza onto the pizza stone.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Cooking Accessories I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I make about 20 homemade pizzas each year and I purchased this Pizza peel a few weeks before this years Superbowl so I could get the hang of it. I made two test pizza's and the peel did a perfect job. I then made 4 pizza's on Superbowl Sunday and it made my job so much easier. I've since used it for several other needs like scooping up a baked salmon as I use foil instead of a pan to cook my salmon in the oven and the peel was the perfect tool for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Its beautiful and well crafted
customer_reviews.text: I received my pizza peel today packaged very well no damaged and its made of the highest quality and I know well I am so sure it will make a great pizza. I love this item so much I am going to do a second review with the pizza on it. I am shocked that it is so perfect and great durability and great craftsmanship..
customer_reviews.author: Chilies

customer_reviews.title: when  & where to use
customer_reviews.text: Preferences..preferences.. some like metal, some like wood.. gave a wooden to son-in-law for B-day because wood seems at times to slide easier with pizza but also can be a serving board for other items.. cheese .. vegetables.. so end of with multiple uses...
customer_reviews.author: JAL

customer_reviews.title: Should have had one of these years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this "peel" (such a term!) is superb. Finely finished, easy to handle. We like the size for our 12-inch pizzas. We form them on a pizza pan (better when doing more than one pizza at a time, oh yeah!) with corn meal on the bottom. We then put the pan in the oven to set the bottom. Next we use the peel to transfer the partly-baked pizza from the pan to our pizza stone to finish. Use the peel again to transfer from the stone to the table. Magnificent!
customer_reviews.author: P. S. Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: The Heritage pizza peel was well packaged, probably by a wonderful team of white gloved people, and delivered to me in the timely manner I requested at order. I may be crazy but I think I saw a few unicorns flying in the sky over my home the day it was delivered. It is a very attractive piece of wood and we can't wait to use it for pizza when we make it tonight. Thank you for such a great product. EAB
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth buzenius

customer_reviews.title: Nice peel, until it split
customer_reviews.text: I'm kinda glad that I didn't write a review right away. The peel came quickly enough and it was a really nice peel. Last night, however, it split soon after loading a pizza onto our stove. It didn't completely fall apart, so I was able to finish cooking. I'm glad I was using a ready made crust as opposed to fresh dough. That would've been a nightmare. I think I'm going to look for a metal peel to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Averey

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking piece of wood that happens to function nicely as a pizza peel. It is sturdy and is fine for sliding that pizza in or out of the oven. I love the way it looks and have it hanging on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Dale BLodgett

customer_reviews.title: Nice pizza peel, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Nice pizza peel. Good size, good finish, nice to look at, but mine came with definite bow to it and it was easy to see why looking at the box, which had apparently been sitting in a tall stack of them. Suspect it didn't come from the manufacturer that way.
customer_reviews.author: be serious

customer_reviews.title: My Heritage pizza peel arrived nicely packaged and ready for action
customer_reviews.text: My Heritage pizza peel arrived nicely packaged and ready for action. It made it's debut in our kitchen last night - pizza night. I was particularly interested to see whether or not the pizza dough would slide off the peel (with cornmeal sprinkled on it) and onto the heated stone in our oven. Voila! It slid off smoothly and completely. It was beautiful. I am delighted with this peel. It's a good size, not too heavy, beautifully grained, has nicely tapered edges, and most importantly - it does it's intended job very well. It has it all - excellent form and function. I heartily recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy to have it
customer_reviews.text: So much easier sliding a pizza off the peel on to the hot stone. I work hard to make the dough just right- I don't want to ruin it putting it in and taking it out of the oven. The peel is thin enough to get under the cooked pizza easily when it is time to take it out. I have only used it a couple of times but the quality and durability seems to be there. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: ke

customer_reviews.title: Warped and too thick
customer_reviews.text: Is it supposed to come pre-warped? Would make it very difficult to get under a pizza while it’s baking to turn around for even doneness. Also too thick. I’m sending it back and ordering a metalcraft peel. Thinner is better
customer_reviews.author: CRbound3

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new pizza peel - it has already come in handy and served its purpose well many times since we got it a couple weeks ago! Not to mention, it looks beautiful too. We had a minor issue with the original order, but the customer service was great and everything was perfectly resolved in a timely fashion. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big and sturdy. Use it ever week during homemade pizza night! Good edge to it to easily scoop up floppy uncooked pizza. Nice look too. We actually hang it on wall in kitchen as "wall art" when not being used Just wish handle was a little longer, but that would probably sacrifice it's sturdiness
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, and does the job. The only thing I noticed is that since I use it with a pizza stone, the abrasive surface of the stone causes some scratching at the tapered lip of the peel. I guess that's to be expected with wood.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Toronto

customer_reviews.title: High quality charcuterie...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece. I'm pleased with the dimensions and the quality of finish on the board. My specific purpose for this purchase is to use as charcuterie board during entertaining. It's so attractive I've hung it in a place of prominence in my kitchen; I'm looking forward to using it with pride. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sailgal59

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Peel
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. I spread the dough out and make the pizza all right on the peel. Before adding toppings, I sprinkle a little bit of cornmeal underneath the pizza and it slides right off into the oven. The only downside is that you want to avoid using a pizza cutter on it but I simply use kitchen scissors and cut the pizza and it works fine. I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: This pizza peel is for real
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It's made of fine wood and has a beautiful finish, with precise beveling of the edges. Certainly a better peel than the pinewood one that we used to own, which cracked. This is really good-looking enough to hang on the wall, besides doing the one thing it's supposed to do, which is to slide pizzas or similar items in and out of an oven. You won't go wrong with this pizza peel for a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Prussian Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great for my home "Pizzeria".
customer_reviews.text: This pizza peel is wonderful. It handles getting my freshly made pizza dough onto my stone perfectly. It also looks great while doing that task and hanging on the wall waiting for its next use. Pizzeria perfection all because of my new peel.
customer_reviews.author: michael steele

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a place to put my hot pizza on and also cut it. the size is perfect for a regular size pizza. The wood is soft so when I cut the pizza it does leave marks on the wood. That is ok with me. I do love it.
customer_reviews.author: shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be very high quality
customer_reviews.text: This came right away, was packaged nicely, had a letter from the future, and works very well. It sits very flatly on the counter, is very smooth and appears well made, looks like a million bucks, and after two pizzas I can say it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: PICK THIS PEEL!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further! This pizza peel is the best bang for your buck, it's beautiful and durable. Searching for a larger durable peel I read lots of reviews. I originally purchased a different peel, that one was flimsy and broke during its first use. A little defeated I went back to the reviews and settled on this one. I'm so glad I got this, it's awesome. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Still working up my skillz in transferring pizza to the stone, but still better than my attempts without the peel. I am going to use as a cheese board as well. So pretty!
customer_reviews.author: cmoney

customer_reviews.title: Works well for us
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working great! We build our pizza on the peel, then slide it in the oven. When done, I'm able to slip this under the crisp pizza crust and pull it out. My only concern is durability. The wood feels a little soft and the coating is now scratched where it slides along the pizza stone in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: M. V. W.

customer_reviews.title: I hate clutter so I'm not the type to keep too ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything I was hoping for and more. I hate clutter so I'm not the type to keep too many tools or gadgets in the kitchen. But I've been doing more entertaining lately so a really nice looking cheeseboard and a well made pizza peel were the only two things I've been thinking of purchasing. This works well for both functions. The wood is really beautiful, it also feels good in my hand, is very smooth and has a nice sloping edge so I know this will make my pizzas a lot more rounded and evenly cooked than my previous method of shimmying the dough off the back of a regular cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Dana C Grant

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this beautiful Pizza peel! It is the perfect size for use with my pizza stone! Perfect size and shape on the handle as well. Functional and stunningly beautiful! I know we will use it for years and years to come! Beautifully crafted!
customer_reviews.author: Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't just look good, it works
customer_reviews.text: While I bought it for cutting my pizza on it (which isn't recommend ), I use the cardboard that came with the frozen pizza to prevent marks. Because it would be a shame to mark up the beautiful wood this is made out of. I like the fact since it has a handle, I am able move the cut pizza from the kitchen to my media room easily. My sister has one also and she uses it as intended. She is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: acornone

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: arrived safely and it's gorgeous. Trouble is, I am getting the urge to hang it on the wall (piece of art!) instead of using it. I am very happy with the product and the "crazy, cool" company that followed up on the order. They really want you to be satisfied. Imagine, in this day and age....... Customer Service. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Taffy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pizza peel!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new pizza peel and is is just beautiful. It is the perfect size for a large pizza and the wood is gorgeous. I know we will be enjoying many pizzas using this pizza peel. Thank you for a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Van Gunst

customer_reviews.title: It is SO beautiful, that I want to hang it on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one huge problem with this pizza peel. It is SO beautiful, that I want to hang it on the wall and not use it for its intended purpose! I have targeted stuff on the kitchen/dining room wall that will come down to be replaced by this gorgeous pizza peel. Hopefully, some day I will be able to bring myself to actually use it and update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kay

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew these existed years ago!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used my new peel once so I can't comment on the durability, but it is very nice looking and worked like a charm. Wish I had discovered that such a board existed years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Angela French

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Quality
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of baking and use this to remove pretzels, rolls, loaves...everything, from a smoking hot oven. Certainly helps with the “branding iron” effect. Highly recommend if you are looking for quality, beauty and long life.
customer_reviews.author: ganderbe

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift, and my son-in-law feels like a gourmet pizza chef when he uses this. He proudly hung it on the side of a cabinet. I would suggest buying a small piece of leather to tie as a hanger. Great size!
customer_reviews.author: jennigirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful enough for the wall yet functional
customer_reviews.text: This pizza peel is beautifully made and when lightly dusted with semolina allows pizza dough to slid right off. The finish is perfect having the smoothness and shine necessary to make the perfect peel. I highly recommend. Note, however, that this is NOT a cutting board. It would be a shame to ruin the surface.
customer_reviews.author: NHNick

customer_reviews.title: Good Pizza Peel.
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight, I like that Heritage is stamped only on 1 side of the handle in case I decide to use it also as a cutting board I can tell the sides apart and it comes with a hole predrilled for hanging. It came with a hilarious little sheet about me saving the world. I like to smile and I smiled when I read it.
customer_reviews.author: max@vb

customer_reviews.title: Dough sticks like crazy resulting in failed launches.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful peel. But not very functional for launching pies. It’s very smooth from the stain so dough tends to stick to it. Even with semolina dusted on I have the occasional failed launch with this peel. Ive recently taken to sanding down one side of the peel to make it a bit rougher. This has really helped out and no longer have the sticking issues. Unless you’re willing to sand down this peel I would not recommend it. Opt for something with a rougher texture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my application.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for more of a decorative application. I put the logo of my friend's pizza restaurant on the paddle and used clear polyurethane to seal it. It came out very well. The Acacia wood is handsome and seems much more substantial than one made from bamboo,
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly smooth and good looking board
customer_reviews.text: The board works flawlessly. Used it the day it arrived. My son made 3 pizzas. I was concerned about the previous reviews about the peel not being smooth, but ours is very smooth. A little bit of flour on the board and the pizza slid like it was on ice. It is almost a piece of art. Very good looking functional board. Do not hesitate to buy this. I am surprised that nobody mentioned the letter included in the box. The letter that asks for you to leave a review is very funny and creative, you have to read it. I don't want to give it away though. It apparently worked, as this is my first review, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: bdambrose

customer_reviews.title: Functional and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It has the look of fine craftsmanship. There is some shipping damage. The box was crushed at handle end, causing a 1.25 “ scratch/gouge. But I don’t mind it, I will sand and oil it and it will just add some character. I’m very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: CarolRo

customer_reviews.title: And I must say that the Heritage Acacia Wood Pizza Peel is by far the best. As I am sure the Peel makers know
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased five Pizza Peels as of late. And I must say that the Heritage Acacia Wood Pizza Peel is by far the best. As I am sure the Peel makers know. God ordered Noah to build the Ark out of Acacia Wood. He knew it was a great wood from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for grilling or oven and so pretty ended up hanging on wall by my rolling pins. Would purchase again and keeping in mind for gift giving
customer_reviews.author: Carol Maag

customer_reviews.title: Great looking pizza peel!
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not actually used it yet, it sure looks great and appears made well. Nice weight - not too heavy or awkward. Looks good in my kitchen even as decor. I can't find a supplier or manufacturer website on-line, which is too bad as I wanted to see what else they might have. All that is provided is an email address.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R Santora

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive well made pizza peel, but be aware that if you use it to put pizza on and take it off of a baking stone the finish will scratch where it contacts the stone. For me this is not a problem, but I will always make sure to use it with the same side up.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Stubblefield

customer_reviews.title: Everything I ever wanted in a peel
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful product. Sturdy. Moves pizzas around like a champ. It’s everythjng I hoped for in a peel (and believe me, I had VERY high expectations). But really I’m here because I care about the future. Buy more of these peels. I’ve been told the future depends on it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Murphy

customer_reviews.title: @Amanda Hamilton ;p
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pizza peel last week and I've made four pizzas with it so far. It has a really nice look and feel! It works well and can be cleaned easily. Also mine came with a message from the future asking for a review of the product claiming the world was going to end if the right person didn't see my review and buy it; that was a pretty fun, unique read. So, @Amanda Hamilton, buy the peel. It's pretty sick.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Weatherspoon

customer_reviews.title: Superb peel, even better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great pizza peel, works wonderfully. Original item shipped had a small crack in the end, but a replacement was quickly shipped and was perfect. It's made pizza night at home fun again. Great customer service. A+
customer_reviews.author: Regie T

customer_reviews.title: The board itself is beautiful! Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The customer service of this company was off the hook! They even had me chuckling several times with their humor. The board itself is beautiful! Very sturdy. This isn't a flimsy board like I've had in years past. You could easily use this to lift a large roast out of the wood fired oven. The wood is pretty enough I wish I had a way to hang this in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Fennell

customer_reviews.title: just for looks
customer_reviews.text: fairly functional and looks good out of the package, but after the first use, it is scarred from contacting the oven grates, and also the grain raised from the pizza. Needs to be refinished after first use?! Still functional for now, but will replace.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and affordable. I have used the pizza peel to put artisan bread into oven and remove from oven. It is the perfect width/depth to maneuver the bread. It was also great to move to wire rack. Very Easy to clean and to handle! It fits perfectly in the wire rack I use to store my cookie sheets and baking stones.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty piece but be prepared for cracks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my peel for a little less than a year and sadly it cracked where the boards meet. I’ve been very careful to clean and store it properly but I think the way in which it’s made is what ultimately contributed to the cracking. It’s a pretty piece of wood but unfortunately, it’s not well made.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, quick delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The peel is well constructed and pretty too! Delivery was quick - on my doorstep before the dough finished rising!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: It's Beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pizza peel... but it's a beautiful pizza peel. I like the harder wood that's it made from. No stains from spilled sauce or olive oil. Just wiped it clean. Just make sure you put down corn meal under the dough and it won't stick. Very nice I recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade their old peel.
customer_reviews.author: tgaffer

customer_reviews.title: Also very inexpensive. Plus fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for pizza and for bread. It works very well. It is beautiful. This is my second purchase. First for us and this one for our grand daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Duffy MacDuff

customer_reviews.title: WINNER!
customer_reviews.text: Almost too pretty to use but my son in law does anyway. As a matter of fact, when it isn't on the grill, it's hung on the wall like kitchen art.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately even with a lot of flour and/or corn meal, and making the pizza as quick as possible on the peel before sliding it off into the oven, it tends to stick. Wish I would have gotten a different one
customer_reviews.author: MKC

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: floured it well prior to putting the pizza dough on the peel. built the pizza in place. used a large spatula to help get the pizza off the peel. worked well to get the pizza off the stone when cooked.
customer_reviews.author: mateo

customer_reviews.title: Made of glued together pieces, falling apart right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, not made from a single piece of wood, but 4 pieces glued together. Unpacked the peel and never got a chance to use it - it’s falling apart at the seam. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: OPri

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza peel.
customer_reviews.text: Actually haven't had a chance to use it yet, but it's very pretty and sturdy. The tapered edge looks as if it will be easy to slide pizza off & on. If I encounter any problems, I'll repost.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza peel. Does a great job sliding pizza on or off.
customer_reviews.author: adrian b

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for home use!!
customer_reviews.text: Wood quality and finish are exceptional. The short handle and broad blade make it perfect for moving bread and pizza from prep counter to oven rack in a small kitchen. You have the broad surface to handle the largest loaves/pizzas combined with the short handle for good balance and maneuverability in restricted kitchen spaces. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Haught

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous wood and superior workmanship!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous piece of wood with excellent workmanship. So much better than my previous unfinished one which broke in half, which cost almost as much as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, came with a small crack
customer_reviews.text: Nice pizza peel, holds flour nicely, easy to use. Came with a small crack that does not affect functionality, but makes me worried about long term durability.
customer_reviews.author: T. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pizza Peel
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing this peel, I was using a metal peel for launching and had issues with pizzas sticking to the peal. Every pizza slides off easily onto my Kamado Joe. It is well made and solid, smooth, light and fits perfectly in my corner cabinet next to my Lazy Susan.
customer_reviews.author: Tboans

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and thickness. Peel is sturdy and so beautiful we hung it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: beautiful & useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful product and perfectly shaped for its purpose. In addition, the folks who run the company have a delightful sense of humor in their instructions. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SEP

customer_reviews.title: So Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this pizza peel. It feels strong, durable and was very easy clean!! This board definitely fulfilled my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: T. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made item. I knew I had shopped at the correct place when I opened the box and the Angeles sang. All in all a good product at a fair price. I would do business again with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J Cousineau Jr

customer_reviews.title: The size is great. I was a little disappointed that there seemed ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for our anniversary, and he's very excited to use it. The size is great. I was a little disappointed that there seemed to be some strange looking splotches in a few places, almost as though there had been a sticker or something spilled on it. When I tried to rub it off with my thumb, it didn't come up though, so I'm not totally sure what it could have been. It just sort of looked like it might have been used as a display or something.
customer_reviews.author: KMSBarnes

product_meta.title: Heritage Acacia Wood Pizza Peel, Great for Homemade Pizza, Cheese and Charcuterie Boards - 22" x 14"
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL: Natural acacia wood is designed to look good enough to hang on the wall in your kitchen.
TAPERED EDGE: Lets you swoop up your pizza and breads out of the oven with ease.
PERFECT HANDLE: That fits your hands so you can confidently serve your dinner, cheese platter or charcuterie board.
SIZED JUST RIGHT: 22" x 14" Wide enough to fit all your home pizzas, thick enough not to warp, but thin enough to easily slide under a pizza in the oven.
SMOOTH: We only use the highest quality wood that has been sanded and crafted to last a lifetime.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,302 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
